thread.title: TN Governor likely to invite Sasikala loyalist E Palanisamy to form government
thread.title_full: TN Governor likely to invite Sasikala loyalist E Palanisamy to form government

title: TN Governor likely to invite Sasikala loyalist E Palanisamy to form government
text:
Print Chennai : AIADMK's legislature party leader Edapadi K. Palanisamy on Wednesday evening met Tamil Nadu Governor C. Vidyasagar Rao with a list of legislators supporting him and staked claim to form the government, a party leader said. Addressing reporters after the Governor met Palanisamy and others, Fisheries Minister Jayakumar said: "We have submitted to the Governor the list of legislators supporting Palanisamy. We also requested Rao to call Palanisamy to form the government." According to Jayakumar, the Governor listened to them and said necessary action would be taken. Palanisamy is part of AIADMK General Secretary V.K. Sasikala camp. The Governor later met the rival party faction of acting Chief Minister O. Panneerselvam. 
Here are the recent developments of the big story: SEARCH talking point on sify news Latest Features
